surface-0.description: This colour is used for the module background

surface-1.description: This colour is used for the module

surface-2.description: This colour is used for the module

surface-message.description: This colour is used for the ticket & toast notification background

surface-hover.description: This colour is used for the previous-next module  background - Article Page

surface-0-inverted.description: This colour is used for the module background

surface-1-inverted.description: This colour is used for the module background

surface-2-inverted.description: This colour is used for the module background

surface-hover-inverted.description: This colour is used for the previous-next module  background - Article Page

global-focus.description: To highlight the focus mode on different UI elements

surface-error.description: This colour is used for the ticket & toast notification background

surface-error-inverted.description: This colour is used for the ticket & toast notification background

surface-success.description: This colour is used for the ticket & toast notification background

surface-success-inverted.description: This colour is used for the ticket & toast notification background

1-default.description: This is the main color used for headline text on default background.

1-inverted.description: This color is used for headline text on inverted background,

1-subtle.description: This color is used for "permanent range" text and alcohol % on product cards.

1-subtle-inverted.description: This color is used for "permanent range" text and alcohol  % on product cards with inverted background.

1-muted.description: This color is used for secondary text, such as prices on product cards, Description text on Section title, descriptions on Product Cards, captions

1-subtle.description: This color is used for strikethrough copy (prices, for example), secondary texts, categories on the footer, rage on the Product Cards

pagination-default.description: This token is used in Product Cards, Scroll indicator and Videos

pagination-inverted.description: This token is used in Product Cards, Scroll indicator and Videos

pagination-hover.description: This token is used in Product Cards, Scroll indicator and Videos

pagination-hover-inverted.description: This token is used in Product Cards, Scroll indicator and Videos

pagination-active.description: This token is used in Product Cards, Scroll indicator and Videos

pagination-active-inverted.description: This token is used in Product Cards, Scroll indicator and Videos

accent.description: This token is used in Product Cards, Scroll indicator and Videos

toggle-default.description: Size on DTC cards, on PDP and the Grid View Toggle

toggle-default-inverted.description: Size on DTC cards, on PDP and the Grid View Toggle

toggle-active.description: Size on DTC cards, on PDP and the Grid View Toggle

toggle-active-inverted.description: Size on DTC cards, on PDP and the Grid View Toggle

section-font-default.description: Titles of different modules (when the background colour is not the accent one) such as Tasting notes, Awards, Brand Gallery, Explore More, etc

section-font-inverted.description: Titles of different modules (when the background colour is not the accent one) such as Tasting notes, Awards, Brand Gallery, Explore More, etc (Inverted version)

section-separator-default.description: The separator elements on some modules such as Tasting notes, Awards, Brand Gallery, Explore More, etc

section-font-onAccent.description: Titles of different modules (when the background colour is the accent one) such as Tasting notes, Awards, Brand Gallery, Explore More, etc

switch-background-default.description: This token is used on the cookies' toggle pop-up
